at least.gloss: if nothing else (`leastwise' is informal and `leastways' is colloquial)

at leisure.gloss: in an unhurried way or at one's convenience

at length.gloss: in a lengthy or prolix manner

at long last.gloss: as the end result of a succession or process

at the same time.gloss: despite anything to the contrary (usually preceding a concession)

atrociously.gloss: to an extravagant or immoderate degree

atypically.gloss: in a manner that is not typical
